description:
runtime: remove unused moreframesize_minalloc field
It was used to request large stack segment for GC
when it was running not on g0.
Now GC is running on g0 with large stack,
and it is not needed anymore.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://dvyukov%40google.com@code.google.com/p/go/

On 2013/06/14 08:40:38, dvyukov wrote:
> Hello mailto:golang-dev@googlegroups.com,
> 
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://dvyukov%2540google.com%40code.google.com/p/go/

LGTM. Thank you.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=b5808d92a1c7 ***

runtime: remove unused moreframesize_minalloc field
It was used to request large stack segment for GC
when it was running not on g0.
Now GC is running on g0 with large stack,
and it is not needed anymore.

R=golang-dev, dave
CC=golang-dev

subject: code review 10242045: runtime: remove unused moreframesize_minalloc field
